translation: The action {{.action_title}}, regarding incident {{.incident_name}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}.
A new log with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.logger}}. Click here to view it in IncidentChanger.
Warning! A new log with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.logger}}. This might require your immediate attention. Click here to view it in IncidentChanger.
